channel.title: Welcome to My Site on Larry Mulhstein
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to My Site on Larry Mulhstein

item.title: Vision
item.description: Paragraph about my work We can heal the world by deepening our understanding and by guiding it with respect and moving with will. Technologies of togetherness. Living by following our hearts and walking the path as best we can.

item.title: Cool Cat
item.description: A rose is either a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae, or the flower it bears. There are over three hundred species and tens of thousands of cultivars.They form a group of plants that can be erect shrubs, climbing, or trailing, with stems that are often armed with sharp prickles. Their flowers vary in size and shape and are usually large and showy, in colours ranging from white through yellows and reds.

item.title: Cool Kitty
item.description: A rose is either a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae, or the flower it bears. There are over three hundred species and tens of thousands of cultivars.They form a group of plants that can be erect shrubs, climbing, or trailing, with stems that are often armed with sharp prickles. Their flowers vary in size and shape and are usually large and showy, in colours ranging from white through yellows and reds.

item.title: About me
item.description: larry grew up building physical things and expanded into the craft of systems and understanding. He studied computer science, cognitive science, philosophy, and literature during his undergraduate at Case Western and packaged this work into a bachelor’s degree in embodied intelligence and some other majors and minors. He pursued his PhD in cognitive science at the University of California San Diego, where he studied communication, information, machine learning, and the philosophy, mathematics, and implementation of intelligence.
